title: Catching Feelings
lyrics:
This song lasts for a duration of three minutes and 54 seconds, from his album Believe. It sounds similar to his previous single “Only Thing I Ever Get for Christmas”
[Verse 1]
Sun comes up on another morning
My mind never wakes up without you on it
And it's crazy to me
I even see you in my dreams
Is this meant to be?
Could this be happening to me? Yeah
We were best of friends since we were this high
So why do I get nervous every time you walk by?
We would be on the phone all day
Now I can't find the words to say to you
Now what am I supposed to do?
[Chorus]
Could it be a possibility?
I'm tryna see what's up
It's been me for you, and you for me
Maybe now it's time for us
Tryna keep it all together, but enough is enough
They say we're too young for love, but I'm catching feelings
(Do-do-do-do-do-do-do-do-do-do-do)
Catching feelings, girl
(Do-do-do-do-do-do-do-do-do-do-do)
[Verse 2]
In my head, we're already together
I'm good alone, but with you, I'm better
I just wanna see you smile (See you smile)
Just say the word and I'll be right there (Be right there)
I ain't never goin' nowhere
I'm just tryna see where this can take us
'Cause everything about you, girl, is so contagious
I think I finally got it down
And all that's left to do now is get out the mirror
And say it to her, yeah

[Chorus]
Could it be a possibility?
I'm tryna see what's up
It's been me for you, and you for me
Maybe now it's time for us
Tryna keep it all together, but enough is enough
They say we're too young for love, but I'm catching feelings
(Do-do-do-do-do-do-do-do-do-do-do)
Catching feelings, girl
(Do-do-do-do-do-do-do-do-do-do-do)
[Bridge]
Should I tell her how I really feel? (How I really feel)
Or should I move in closer? Just be still? (How will I know?)
'Cause if I take a chance and I touch her hand, will everything change?
How do I know if she feels the same? Whoa, ooh-ooh
[Chorus]
Could it be a possibility?
I'm tryna see what's up (What's up?)
It's been me for you (Me for you), and you for me (You for me)
Maybe now is time for us
Tryna keep it all together, but enough is enough
They say we're too young for love, but I'm catching feelings
(Do-do-do-do-do-do-do-do-do-do-do)
Catching feelings, girl
(Do-do-do-do-do-do-do-do-do-do-do)

[Outro]
(Do-do-do-do-do-do-do-do-do-do-do)
Catching feelings
(Do-do-do-do-do-do-do-do-do-do-do)
Catching feelings
Catching feelings
